body.name: HangSmart TV Wall Mount 2-Pack - Universal Compatibility for 19-100 inch TVs, Dual Bundle, Holds up to 150lbs, Easy DIY Installation, Complete Kit with Two Mounts, Perfect for Bundles and Multiple TVs

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Hang Smart TV Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 39 mins.
features: DOUBLE THE CONVENIENCE: This 2-Pack variation provides you with not one but two HangSmart TV Wall Mounts, allowing you to effortlessly mount multiple TVs in different rooms or create a cohesive setup in your entertainment area.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with a diverse range of flat screen LED and curved TVs, including popular brands such as Samsung, Sony, LG, Vizio, and more. Each mount accommodates TVs from 19 to 100 inches, offering versatility for various screen sizes.

ROBUST SUPPORT, STYLISH SETUP: Engineered for strength and durability, HangSmart securely holds TVs up to 150 lbs, enhancing both safety and aesthetics. Create a sleek and sophisticated look for your living space with our reliable TV mounting solution.

FLEXIBLE MOUNTING OPTIONS: Whether it's drywall, brick, cement, wood, or concrete, our mounts can be securely attached to various surfaces, providing the flexibility to choose the perfect location for your TVs.

COMPLETE DIY KIT: Each 2-Pack comes with all the necessary hardware, including two wall mounts, two TV hooks, screws, and fasteners for standard TV sizes and mounting holes. The VESA standard color guide with a built-in leveler ensures a precise and seamless installation.
body.description: Flexibility Meets Strength: HangSmart TV Wall Mount - No Studs, No Fuss, Just Effortless TV Installation! FULLY DIY NO-STUD SOLUTION Elevate your home entertainment experience with the HangSmart TV Wall Mount – the ultimate DIY no-stud solution designed for hassle-free installation of 19 to 100-inch flat screen TVs. Our patented design revolutionizes the mounting process, making it a breeze for homeowners and renters alike. Transform Your Living Space Flex Nylon for Flexibility Step-by-Step Independence

Robust Support – Holds up to 150 lbs securely

The VESA standard color guide with a built-in leveler ensures precision

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding product that couldn’t be easier to install!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical buying this product, but I gave it a shot and was very impressed! The box came with all hardware and was very very easy to follow. I mostly surprised at how strong the brackets were. I’ve already purchased three more of these kits for the rest of my home.just save yourself the extra expense of having someone come in to mount your TVs. My wife couldn't believe how easy it was and that no drilling was required and without using studs.We couldn’t be happier with the mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and Easy
reviews.reviewText: Have this done for me, but it took less than 30 minutes to get it doneI love the way it looks and I’m not worried at all that’s gonna fall. It’s pretty sturdy.I got these for 65 inch TV. I bought two sets right now I’m only using one. It’s pretty awesome so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely the best product I have ever purchased! It’s truly unbelievable and super easy! I had one small issue and the owner himself spoke with me on a Sunday no less and resolved the issue!! It’s an absolute Amazing product! I highly recommend! Save your money on electrician! I would give more stars if it was possible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game Changer! Best invention!
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how something like this wasn't invented sooner. It was easy to put up. It didn't take long. I am so happy I didn't have to get one of those big bulky brackets that look difficult to install. Whoever the inventor is of this product ... I love you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mostly a great product
reviews.reviewText: This product is great for a simple installation with minimal impact to the wall being 8 nail holes rather than big bolts and drywall anchors. Don’t expect it to actually be 5 minutes when you factor in measuring how high you want to mount, where to center, etc., but it is faster than traditional mounts. Seemed perfectly fine strength wise for the 50” tv I mounted. Where the product falls short is how high the wall mounts are relative to where the tv hooks onto them. For my tv they would have been visible above the TV, so I flipped the hooks on the back of the TV 180 degrees. Definitely a less than desirable way to mount it as the TV is more prone to sliding off the mounts side to side, but worked. Probably not an issue on bigger TVs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the buy
reviews.reviewText: One thing I’ve always hated was hanging tv’s. Once I saw this on an Instagram ad, I wanted to get it and give it a shot. I did, no regrets. The package includes everything you need, even the thumbtacks. I wouldn’t say it took me 5 minutes, but definitely within 15. Overall it was pretty easy and very satisfied with the purchase. I’ll be buying another for our 70” living room tv!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As simple as they say
reviews.reviewText: High quality. Easy to understand instructions. Simple installation. I could not believe how easy this was.
The tiny level is crazy and doesn't really help. But otherwise this works! Hung up a 72 inch TV easily and it's still up there. No studs. I'm very impressed.
